# Call for papers for the VIIIth Space Resources Conference -- Space Technology Centre 

URL: https://ctk.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail/call-for-papers-for-the-viiith-space-resources-conference
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:09

Call for papers for the VIIIth Space Resources Conference 

 24-01-2025 

 We would like to announce the Call for Papers for the VIII Space Resources Conference, which will take place on May 21-23, 2025 at the AGH University of Krakow. 

Important dates:

15th March
 - Abstract Submission Deadline

31th March
 - Abstracts Acceptance

15th April 
- Early bird registration deadline

29th April
 - Regular registration deadline

from 29th April 
- Late registration

July 2024 
- Camera ready (min. 6 page paper)

Sessions of the conference:

Space Resources

Space Structures and Materials Design and Operations

Space Law & Management

Bioengineering

Cybersecurity in Space

Deep Space Exploration

Remote sensing and Earth Observation

Society and Space, Sustainability

Space Biology & Astrobiology

Habitats, Bioastronautics & Life Support Systems

Moon Exploration and Exploitation

Student Session (3 min. presentation + poster)

Paper submission:

You are welcome to submit a 1-page extended abstract including illustrations and list of references according to the topics of interest. Authors are welcome to organize and manage special sessions during conference. Each session will contain 4-6 papers in a related field as specified above or proposed by a session organizer.

All registered abstracts will be published with the conference program. Full-page papers will be also selected by the Scientific Committee to extend for Springer Nature books with online access of the content on SpringerLink. The papers will be reviewed by two reviewers each.
